::DrillBit::

He looks out of a view port. He sees Megatron and his guys retreating.
He then sees Apoc go after them.
"Killfest, Megatron is escaping. Apoc is chasing them. Its your call.
What do we do?"

::Dollen::

He waits but no one comes.
"Ooooooooooooo k, where are they?"

::Demolition::

He makes his way back to the Alliance base, and gets to a CR.
